title: Corporate Research Ethics Leadership Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Research processes and fundamental knowledge of corporate R&D management
context.additional_context: For science field corporate managers, conducted in a BYOD environment. Strengthens research ethics practice competencies through parallel online modules and offline workshops

learning_goals: Analyze research misconduct cases and develop prevention strategies at Bloom’s Taxonomy levels 4–6 (Analysis, Evaluation, Creation)
Cultivate the ability to resolve research ethics dilemmas through scenario-based learning grounded in Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction
Develop team-specific research ethics guidelines and implement action plans via project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
